title: Online Science Course Development Through Collaborative Mentoring

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Course cultivating online course development capabilities in science fields through strengthened collaboration between faculty and instructional designers. Conducts project-based assessments in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with instructional designers to establish science content development strategies aligned with learning outcomes.
Learners can design time-efficient online course development processes utilizing mentoring relationships.
Learners can produce science education materials applicable in limited technological environments for use in project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
